ComicInfo.Summary:
Check out KISS as they turn the tables on evil and try to protect innocent lives, all while rockin’ & rollin’ harder and louder than you could ever dream of in the epic conclusion of KISS: BLOOD AND STARDUST!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Stuart Sayger | 1 | B | Cover B | Rodney Buchemi | 2 | C | Cover C | Maria Sanapo | 3 | D/Sub | Subscription Cover D | Photo | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Rodney Buchemi | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Stuart Sayger | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Maria Sanapo | 7 | H/RE | Unknown Retailer Exclusive Variant Cover | Jim Balent | 8 | I/RE | Unknown Retailer Exclusive Variant Cover (Black & White) | Jim Balent | 9 | J/RE | Unknown Retailer Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Jim Balent | 10 |
